attributes.action: Use acommodation built to house Olympic athletes be used to house MP who live outside London!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Acommodation will be built to house athletes during the 2012 Olympics, why not use this acommodation to house MPs who live out side London, thus negating the need to have second homes, extra allowances etc seems like a simple and cost effective idea to me?
